name: Mote Cron Scheduler
description: Create, manage, and run scheduled tasks (cron jobs). Use this skill when the user wants to automate tasks, set up reminders, or schedule recurring operations.
author: mote

tools.name: mote_cron_add
tools.description: Create a new scheduled cron job. Supports prompt, tool, and script job types.

name.description: Unique name for the cron job

schedule.description: Cron expression (e.g., '0 9 * * *' for daily at 9 AM, '*/5 * * * *' for every 5 minutes)

type.description: Job type: 'prompt' (send message to agent), 'tool' (execute a tool), or 'script' (run JavaScript)

message.description: For prompt type: the message to send to the agent

tool.description: For tool type: the name of the tool to execute

enabled.description: Whether the job is enabled (default: true)

name.description: Name of the cron job to delete

tools.name: mote_cron_run
tools.description: Trigger a cron job to run immediately

name.description: Name of the cron job to run

tools.name: mote_cron_get
tools.description: Get details of a specific cron job

tools.name: mote_cron_history
tools.description: Get execution history for cron jobs

job_name.description: Optional: filter history by job name

limit.description: Maximum number of history entries to return (default: 20)
